original_text: then you shall turn it into money and bind up the money in your hand and go to the place that the Lord your God chooses
korean_text: 그것을 돈으로 바꾸어 그 돈을 싸 가지고 네 하나님 여호와께서 택하신 곳으로 가서

sentences.original_text: then you shall turn it into money
bind up the money in your hand
that the Lord your God chooses
